item.title: Caffè Vergnano 1882 has chosen the top three baristas in Singapore
item.description:
Source: Caffè Vergnano 1882. From left: third place winner Rudel Rivera, first place winner Joseph Bringcula, and second placer Stephen Wong. Caffè Vergnano 1882 held its first-ever Barista Challenge at South Beach. Out of 16 participants, three distinguished themselves as top contenders. Source: Caffè Vergnano 1882. The winning latte art from Bringcula. The competition assessed fundamental barista techniques, including the ability to brew espresso properly and steam milk to enhance its flavor...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/caff-vergnano-1882-has-chosen-the-top-three-baristas-in-singapore/

item.title: Wilfa Precision: Just like it was crafted by a professional barista
item.description:
You can now enjoy coffee that’s just as good as your local coffee shop at work every morning. The Wilfa Precision, an automatic coffee brewer, has been launched in Singapore and Malaysia by Papa Palheta, a specialty coffee roaster and retailer. Source: Papa Palheta. The aluminium version of the Wilfa Precision. Developed in Norway, the Wilfa Precision is the result of a collaboration between Wilfa and world-renowned barista Tim Wendelboe. It promises a simplified drip coffee experience without compromising on quality...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/wilfa-precision-just-like-it-was-crafted-by-a-professional-barista/
